screen.title: Viewing recent questions
screen.summary: Overview of questions asked about a project
screen.callout: Asking a question on a project's questions page automatically sends it to the project's support contacts.
Knowledgeable community members can quickly find questions that need an answer.
Launchpad automatically filters the questions it displays, based on the user's preferred languages.

screen.title: Choosing from suggested answers
screen.summary: Launchpad helps projects to build a knowledge-base
screen.callout: If similar questions have been asked before, Launchpad offers them to the user before opening a new support request.
Launchpad will even suggest questions that haven't yet been answered, allowing the user to describe their experience.

screen.title: Discussing the solution
screen.summary: Community members can discuss possible solutions and request more information from the original poster
screen.callout: Following the original question, community members can build a thread of discussion to find a solution.
The problem described in this question is caused by a bug. The link is visible on both this question page and the bug page, to all information is available to everyone working on the issue.
People who are interested in the question can subscribe, to receive an email each time there's an update. The relevant community's support contacts will automatically receive updates.
